trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script: -- println("Map Region 4 map 2: Initialised") SetVar("CountArmyKill",0) local test=0 if test==1 then -- println("TESTING: MAP DON'T WORK CORRECT WITH ANOTHER MAPS ") CompleteQuest("r4m1_RescueBuharsCivilian") TakeQuest("r4m1_GotoAivenGo") end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trStartMap
trigger.script: if QuestStatus("r4m2_FightWithCrazy")==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TActivate("trMoveToFatherCar") TActivate("trMoveToMilitaryBase") TActivate("trNearBase") trigger:Deactivate() end

trigger.Name: trMoveToFatherCar
trigger.script:
-- println("Father Car")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false )
FlyAround(6, 0, 25, 17, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage( 201, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 202, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 203, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 204, 0.25 )
AddPlayerMoney(20000) AddHistory( "r4_FindFatherCar" ); AddFadingMsgId( "fm_history_got" ); trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trMoveToMilitaryBase
trigger.script: -- println("Military Base") if QuestStatus("r4m2_FightWithCrazy")==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TActivate("trActivateArmyDie") CompleteQuest("r4m1_FindMilitaryBase") trigger:Deactivate() end

trigger.Name: trActivateArmyDie
trigger.script: local count = GetVar("CountArmyKill").AsInt if count>=6 then TActivate("trHelpers1") TDeactivate("trMBArmy01Die") else for i = 1,4 do if getObj("MBArmy0"..i)==nil then count = count + 1 local vehlist={"Tank01","Hunter01","Hunter02","Cruiser01","Cruiser02"} local veh1=vehlist[random(getn(vehlist))] local veh2=vehlist[random(getn(vehlist))] CreateTeam("MBArmy0"..i, 1062, CVector(getPos("SpawnCrazy"..random(17).."_loc")),{veh1,veh2},CVector(getPos("MilitaryBase_loc"))) end end TActivate("trMBArmy01Die") SetVar("CountArmyKill", count) end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trNearPlate
trigger.script:
-- println("trNearPlate")
TActivate("cinLookToTarelkaFirst")
AddHistory( "r4_NearTarelka" ) -- AddHistory( "r4_AfterTarelka" ) AddFadingMsgId( "fm_history_got" ) CompleteQuest("r4m2_InvestigationPlate") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExitToR4M1
trigger.script:
GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" )
if b == 1 then -- println ("Yes") PassToMap("r4m1", "FromR4M2", -1) else -- println ("No") TActivate("cinExit41ReturnFirst") end
